properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 7 at 4:42PM EST until February 7 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low
lying areas due to tidal flooding.

* WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the city of
Baltimore.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM EST this evening, especially around the time
of high tide.

* IMPACTS...Flooding is expected at the end of Thames Street in
Baltimore. Water also is expected to cover the promenade at the
dragon boat dock in the Inner Harbor. Minor flooding is also
expected in the Bowley's Quarters area, and minor shoreline
inundation up to one foot above ground is possible elsewhere.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above
normal. The next high tide at Fort McHenry Baltimore is at 5:21
PM and 5:20 AM. The next high tide at Bowley Bar is at 6:44 PM
and 6:28 AM.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING
